name: knowledge-graph-chat-system
description: Knowledge Graph based Chat System with Vue.js frontend and Flask backend

scripts.dev: npm run cleanup-gpu && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.dev-safe: npm run cleanup-gpu && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.dev-remote: npm run cleanup-gpu && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend-server"
scripts.dev-remote-safe: npm run cleanup-gpu && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend-server"
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run build-kg

author: Knowledge Graph Team
